title: Russia vows response if U.S. puts longer-range missiles in Germany
content: A Kremlin spokesman said the stationing of Tomahawk and hypersonic weapons in Europe was a “very serious threat to our national security.”
summary: A Kremlin spokesman said the stationing of Tomahawk and hypersonic weapons in Europe was a “very serious threat to our national security.”

title: Republicans to NATO leaders: Take Trump seriously, not literally
content: NATO’s importance is a rare area of agreement in Congress, but Democrats fear the GOP won’t stand up to Trump were he to take back the White House.
summary: NATO’s importance is a rare area of agreement in Congress, but Democrats fear the GOP won’t stand up to Trump were he to take back the White House.

title: Israeli military says it failed to protect Gaza border town on Oct. 7
content: Israeli leaders are under intense public pressure to account for the security collapse that allowed Hamas militants to attack communities on the Gaza border.
summary: Israeli leaders are under intense public pressure to account for the security collapse that allowed Hamas militants to attack communities on the Gaza border.

title: U.S. will soon end its troubled Gaza pier mission, Pentagon says
content: The Pentagon’s floating pier off Gaza, announced by President Biden in March, has been sidelined several times by poor weather and rough seas.
summary: The Pentagon’s floating pier off Gaza, announced by President Biden in March, has been sidelined several times by poor weather and rough seas.

title: Kenya president fires cabinet after nationwide anti-corruption protests
content: Just six weeks ago, President William Ruto was visiting the White House and basking as a top U.S. ally in Africa, but Kenya has since exploded with anti-corruption protests.
summary: Just six weeks ago, President William Ruto was visiting the White House and basking as a top U.S. ally in Africa, but Kenya has since exploded with anti-corruption protests.

title: Biden administration disturbed by Modi-Putin visit during NATO summit
content: The United States is trying to build a growing alliance with India to counter China, but an independent streak complicates relations.
summary: The United States is trying to build a growing alliance with India to counter China, but an independent streak complicates relations.

title: Buckingham Palace’s East Wing (the one with the balcony) opens to the public
content: Allowing tours of the palace’s East Wing for the first time is part of King Charles III’s ever-so-slight opening of royal residences.
summary: Allowing tours of the palace’s East Wing for the first time is part of King Charles III’s ever-so-slight opening of royal residences.

title: Mexico’s new leader is a climate expert. Can she save an oil nation?
content: Claudia Sheinbaum is vowing to make Mexico a global leader in climate change, weaning it off fossil fuels. But she’s hemmed in by politics and a lack of money.
summary: Claudia Sheinbaum is vowing to make Mexico a global leader in climate change, weaning it off fossil fuels. But she’s hemmed in by politics and a lack of money.

title: Outrage in China after reports of fuel tankers transporting cooking oil
content: Multiple investigations are underway after revelations that tanker trucks used for carrying chemicals and waste then carried edible oil — without being cleaned.
summary: Multiple investigations are underway after revelations that tanker trucks used for carrying chemicals and waste then carried edible oil — without being cleaned.

title: Kenyan police begin patrols, but Haiti’s gangs are unperturbed
content: Haitians are growing frustrated at the lack of action or an apparent plan to take on the heavily armed criminals.
summary: Haitians are growing frustrated at the lack of action or an apparent plan to take on the heavily armed criminals.

title: Man caught trying to smuggle 104 live snakes — in his pants
content: The man went through the “nothing to declare” line when crossing from Hong Kong into mainland China. A search found his pockets full of writhing, scaly contraband.
summary: The man went through the “nothing to declare” line when crossing from Hong Kong into mainland China. A search found his pockets full of writhing, scaly contraband.

title: Britain’s new government vows to prioritize Ukraine fight
content: John Healey, Britain’s defense chief, said the Ukraine war is as much an economic contest between Russia and the West as it is a military fight between Kyiv and Moscow.
summary: John Healey, Britain’s defense chief, said the Ukraine war is as much an economic contest between Russia and the West as it is a military fight between Kyiv and Moscow.

title: NATO leaders move to ‘Trump-proof’ the alliance in Washington
content: Fears that the former president could soon be back in the White House have NATO leaders looking to lock in support for Ukraine, and the alliance itself.
summary: Fears that the former president could soon be back in the White House have NATO leaders looking to lock in support for Ukraine, and the alliance itself.

title: U.S. to again ship 500-pound bombs to Israel, reversing suspension
content: The Biden administration will send 500-pound bombs to Israel that had been held up since May over concerns about the Rafah invasion. But 2,000-pound bombs are still under review.
summary: The Biden administration will send 500-pound bombs to Israel that had been held up since May over concerns about the Rafah invasion. But 2,000-pound bombs are still under review.

title: Israel calls for Gaza City to evacuate, affecting hundreds of thousands
content: The United Nations said the directive urging people to flee “will only fuel mass suffering for Palestinian families.”
summary: The United Nations said the directive urging people to flee “will only fuel mass suffering for Palestinian families.”

title: Russia deems Moscow Times ‘undesirable,’ putting writers, sources at risk
content: The classification forces organizations to cease operations in Russia and opens Russians who work for, fund or collaborate with them to potential prosecution.
summary: The classification forces organizations to cease operations in Russia and opens Russians who work for, fund or collaborate with them to potential prosecution.

title: U.K. police find wanted man after suspected triple murder by crossbow
content: Kyle Clifford, 26, was found by police in Enfield, London, on Wednesday, Hertfordshire police said in a statement.
summary: Kyle Clifford, 26, was found by police in Enfield, London, on Wednesday, Hertfordshire police said in a statement.

title: Ukraine’s first F-16s will see combat this summer, officials say
content: Denmark and the Netherlands have begun to transfer the F-16s they promised to Ukraine, while Belgium and Norway said they would supply others.
summary: Denmark and the Netherlands have begun to transfer the F-16s they promised to Ukraine, while Belgium and Norway said they would supply others.

title: Will the Paris Olympics be the friendliest yet for competing moms?
content: For the first time, the Olympic Village will feature a nursery where parents can leave their babies. France is also making accommodations for breastfeeding mothers.
summary: For the first time, the Olympic Village will feature a nursery where parents can leave their babies. France is also making accommodations for breastfeeding mothers.

title: Russia recruits sympathizers online for sabotage in Europe, officials say
content: Europe has been grappling with an increase in Moscow-led sabotage attacks as Russia turns its focus to increasing the cost of Western support for Ukraine.
summary: Europe has been grappling with an increase in Moscow-led sabotage attacks as Russia turns its focus to increasing the cost of Western support for Ukraine.

title: Russia orders arrest of Yulia Navalnaya, widow of Putin’s nemesis
content: Russia’s decision to issue an arrest warrant for Navalnaya on the same day India’s prime minister was visiting Moscow sent a loud message to Putin’s critics, including in Washington.
summary: Russia’s decision to issue an arrest warrant for Navalnaya on the same day India’s prime minister was visiting Moscow sent a loud message to Putin’s critics, including in Washington.

title: Cypress Hill brings 28-year-old ‘Simpsons’ joke to life with London orchestra
content: Decades later, a joke on “The Simpsons” will come true — with hip-hop group Cypress Hill performing with the London Symphony Orchestra for an “insane” show.
summary: Decades later, a joke on “The Simpsons” will come true — with hip-hop group Cypress Hill performing with the London Symphony Orchestra for an “insane” show.

title: As fears mount of an Israel-Lebanon war, Hezbollah’s arsenal looms large
content: The Lebanese militant group has guided and unguided rockets, antitank artillery, and ballistic and anti-ship missiles, as well as drones equipped with explosives.
summary: The Lebanese militant group has guided and unguided rockets, antitank artillery, and ballistic and anti-ship missiles, as well as drones equipped with explosives.

title: At NATO summit, Gaza is the elephant in the room
content: War rages in Ukraine and across the Middle East. But at this week’s NATO summit, it’s unlikely Gaza will draw much attention.
summary: War rages in Ukraine and across the Middle East. But at this week’s NATO summit, it’s unlikely Gaza will draw much attention.
